# spellCheckerDocumentTag

**Instance Property**

A tag identifying the text view’s text as a document for the spell checker server.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var spellCheckerDocumentTag: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

The document tag is obtained by sending a [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpellChecker/uniqueSpellDocumentTag()] message to the spell server the first time this method is invoked for a particular group of text views. See the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpellChecker]and [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSSpellServer]class specifications for more information on how this tag is used.

## Working with the spelling checker

- **isContinuousSpellCheckingEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver has continuous spell checking enabled.
- **toggleContinuousSpellChecking(_:)**: Toggles whether continuous spell checking is enabled for the receiver.
- **isGrammarCheckingEnabled**: Enables and disables grammar checking.
- **toggleGrammarChecking(_:)**: Changes the state of grammar checking from enabled to disabled and vice versa.
- **setSpellingState(_:range:)**: Sets the spelling state, which controls the display of the spelling and grammar indicators on the given text range.
